figgy.title: As Ephemera Project owners, we would like a CSV download of all LAE Subjects controlled vocabulary, so that we can identify as a group core and area specific subjects in the control.

comments.body: This is interesting. In the past we've synchronized a local fixture from production data. But it doesn't look like we kept the synchronization code: https://github.com/pulibrary/figgy/pull/3333

Got an error running the task: 

```
$ OUTPUT=tmp/lae_subjects.csv bundle exec rake report:lae_subjects
rake aborted!
JSON::ParserError: 809: unexpected token at 'http://viaf.org/viaf/133607895'
/opt/figgy/shared/bundle/ruby/2.6.0/gems/json-2.5.1/lib/json/common.rb:216:in `parse'
/opt/figgy/shared/bundle/ruby/2.6.0/gems/json-2.5.1/lib/json/common.rb:216:in `parse'
/opt/figgy/releases/20210823205334/lib/tasks/report.rake:22:in `block (4 levels) in <main>'
/opt/figgy/releases/20210823205334/lib/tasks/report.rake:18:in `each'
/opt/figgy/releases/20210823205334/lib/tasks/report.rake:18:in `block (3 levels) in <main>'
/opt/figgy/releases/20210823205334/lib/tasks/report.rake:16:in `block (2 levels) in <main>'
/opt/figgy/shared/bundle/ruby/2.6.0/gems/rake-12.3.3/exe/rake:27:in `<top (required)>'
Tasks: TOP => report:lae_subjects
(See full trace by running task with --trace)
```
I think I have this nailed down, turns out the ephemera vocab ingester's been broken ever since we made single valued fields a thing.

pulmap.title: Align lando start and stop commands with DRDS practice

comments.body:
If this were being rescued, I'd expect these notices to have stopped after PR #963 was deployed, but they have not stopped. I wonder if it's because the path (`/rails/active_storage/representations... etc`) is not going through the application controller somehow? 

![Screen Shot 2021-08-23 at 9 44 34 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/65608/130458100-79806859-a4ae-49a6-b16e-988ff97fc6de.png)

Could this be a hacking attempt? Or is there a mis-configured URL linked somewhere?
